coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 Poise Count, 1 Charge Count, 1 Haste, 1 Offense Level Up, or 1 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 Poise Count, 2 Charge Count, 2 Haste, 2 Offense Level Up, or 2 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

levelList.name: Holiday
levelList.desc:

Targets the unit with the Most SP
[BeforeAttack] Target loses 10 SP

If the main target's SP is higher than 15, Atk Weight +1
[BeforeAttack] Target loses 10 SP

levelList.name: Binds
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheKing], and 1 [Enhancement]

levelList.name: Binds
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheKing], and 1 [Enhancement]

levelList.name: Binds
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheBoundKing], and 2 [Enhancement]

levelList.name: Binds
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheKing], and 2 [Enhancement]
[EndSkill] Next turn, apply 20 [Binding] and 3 [Enhancement] to 2 other allies in the order of Deployment
- The number of affected allies grows by (highest Gloom or Pride Reson. - 2) (max 2)

levelList.name: Binds
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheKing], and 2 [Enhancement]
[EndSkill] Next turn, apply 20 [Binding], 3 [Enhancement], and 1 <style="highlight">[AzureDamageUp]</style> to 2 other allies in the order of Deployment
- The number of affected allies grows by (highest Gloom or Pride Reson. - 2) (max <style="highlight">3</style>)

levelList.desc:

[EndSkill] Next turn, apply 20 [Binding], 3 [Enhancement], and <style="highlight">2</style> [AzureDamageUp] to 2 other allies in the order of Deployment
